sourcesContent:
<template v-for="(data, x) in getPost">
  <v-list v-if="x < 5" :key="x + 1">
    <v-list-item @click="go()">
      <v-list-item-icon>
        <v-icon color="indigo"> mdi-map-marker </v-icon>
      </v-list-item-icon>
      <v-list-item-content>
        <v-list-item-title>{{ data.name }}</v-list-item-title>
        <v-list-item-subtitle>
          {{ data.city }} - {{ data.country }}
        </v-list-item-subtitle>
      </v-list-item-content>

      <v-list-item-action>
        <v-list-item-subtitle v-text="data.name"></v-list-item-subtitle>
        <v-list-item-action-text v-text="data.date"></v-list-item-action-text>
      </v-list-item-action>
    </v-list-item>
    <v-divider inset></v-divider>
  </v-list>
</template>

<script>
export default {};
</script>

<script>
export default {
  /* eslint-disable */
  // eslint-disable-next-line
  name: "Home",
  data: () => ({
    searchString: "",
    postList: [],
    items: [
      { name: "Name ascending", id: 0 },
      { name: "Name descending", id: 1 },
      { name: "Year ascending", id: 2 },
      { name: "Year descending", id: 3 },
    ],
  }),
  methods: {
    order(value) {
      const sort_by = (field, reverse, primer) => {
        const key = primer
          ? function (x) {
              return primer(x[field]);
            }
          : function (x) {
              return x[field];
            };

        reverse = !reverse ? 1 : -1;

        return function (a, b) {
          return (a = key(a)), (b = key(b)), reverse * ((a > b) - (b > a));
        };
      };

      switch (value) {
        case 0:
          this.getPost.sort(sort_by("name", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()));
          this.pagLise.sort(sort_by("name", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()));
          console.log(this.getPost);
          console.log(this.pagLise);
          break;
        case 1:
          this.getPost
            .sort(sort_by("name", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()))
            .reverse();
          this.pagLise
            .sort(sort_by("name", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()))
            .reverse();
          console.log(this.getPost);
          console.log(this.pagLise);
          break;
        case 2:
          this.getPost.sort(sort_by("date", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()));
          break;
        case 3:
          this.getPost
            .sort(sort_by("date", false, (a) => a.toUpperCase()))
            .reverse();
          break;
      }
    },
  },
  computed: {
    getPost() {
      return this.$store.getters.getFilteredList;
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.searchString = this.$store.getters.getSearchString;
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.order-btn {
  background-color: #f3f2f2 !important;
  border-color: #414141;
  color: black;
  font-style: normal;
  text-transform: none;
}
</style>
